card.name: Sorin, Lord of Innistrad
card.property: +1: Create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token with lifelink. −2: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+0." −6: Destroy up to three target creatures and/or other planeswalkers. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

card.name: Wall of Omens
card.property: Defender When this creature enters, draw a card.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

card.name: Duskhunter Bat
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
card.property: When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
card.property: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) When this creature enters, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature of their choice.

card.name: Twilight Drover
card.property: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Bloodrage Vampire
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When this creature enters, you may exile another target creature. When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Mausoleum Guard
card.property: When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Phantom General
card.property: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Vampire Outcasts
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Revenant Patriarch
card.property: When this creature enters, if {W} was spent to cast it, target player skips their next combat phase. This creature can't block.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Butcher of Malakir
card.property: Flying Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.

card.name: Vampire's Bite
card.property: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Decompose
card.property: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Sorin's Thirst
card.property: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Urge to Feed
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

card.name: Zealous Persecution
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mortify
card.property: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Spectral Procession
card.property: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Unmake
card.property: Exile target creature.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.property: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Mark of the Vampire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

card.name: Field of Souls
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Absorb Vis
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Death Grasp
card.property: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Tainted Field
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded
card.property: +1: Draw a card, then discard a card at random. −4: Tibalt deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player. −6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Arsonist
card.property: When this creature dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Scorched Rusalka
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Ashmouth Hound
card.property: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, this creature deals 1 damage to that creature.

card.name: Hellspark Elemental
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Vithian Stinger
card.property: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shambling Remains
card.property: This creature can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Coal Stoker
card.property: When this creature enters, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R}.

card.name: Lavaborn Muse
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, this creature deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Mad Prophet
card.property: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

card.name: Hellrider
card.property: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, this creature deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: This creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a creature card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Scourge Devil
card.property: When this creature enters, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Gang of Devils
card.property: When this creature dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

card.name: Bump in the Night
card.property: Target opponent loses 3 life. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Blazing Salvo
card.property: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Flame Slash
card.property: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Geistflame
card.property: Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Recoup
card.property: Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (Mana cost includes color.) Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Strangling Soot
card.property: Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

card.name: Breaking Point
card.property: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Sulfuric Vortex
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, this enchantment deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

card.name: Blightning
card.property: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

card.name: Flame Javelin
card.property: ({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.) Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.property: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

card.name: Devil's Play
card.property: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Akoum Refuge
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.
